question: Question_12_(i)
statement:
Mark each statement either True or False. You do not have to justify
your answer.

If the system $A^2 x = b$ is consistent then $A x = b$ must also be
consistent
sols:
True. Let \emph{x} be a solution to $\displaystyle A^{2}x = b$. Take
$\displaystyle y = Ax$ then $\displaystyle Ay = A(Ax) = A^{2}x = b$
